entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
